I'm very late for the Portal cake party, I know; but what I've heard over the years as to this game being a "new" classic finally all makes sense. Having finally experienced Portal for myself I at last get the incredible, indelible, impression and influence it has made on the gaming culture as a whole, and what an impression it is.
Portal is indeed everything a game of its caliber should be: clever puzzles built around an incredibly fun device that lets players turn the game world into a playground for their own amusement, and an interesting backstory one must piece together themselves, not to mention a most memorable villain. 
If you have yet to try Portal, by all means TRY IT OUT! And have a slice of your favorite cake afterwards!

Short very fun puzzle game. The first I ever played [2007] Can be finished in under 3 hours. Game supports ULTRAWIDE and has a handful of Advanced levels and Challenge levels to complete when main story is done. BOSS fight at the end.
Very short, but incredibly fun and enjoyable. Definitely get both for the full experience though.

By now everyone knows this, but I'll still say it: This is one of the best puzzle games of all time. A must-play for anyone who is a fan of the genre. It's also not much of a commitment, as it can easily be completed in less than 5 hours. The atmosphere is also incredibly well made, but that's to be expected in Valve games. Also the narrative that the game tries to tell you is brilliant and done in a really cool way

発売から10年以上経っても、変わらず名作のゲームです。今回初めてプレイしましたが、謎解きは難易度もほどよくて楽しいですし、シナリオも雰囲気があって魅力的だと感じました。一人称視点で大きく視界が回転することが多いため、画面酔いする人は気を付けた方がいいかもしれませんが、酔い止めを飲んででもプレイする価値のあるゲームです。

Крутая игра, пусть короткая, зато проработана и совершенно не успевает наскучить. Гладос мастер подколов, актёр озвучания Челл, по совместительству голос Гордона Фримена, нереально артистичный, этот тембр вы не скоро забудете, а реакции Челл на шутки Гладос можно разбирать на цитаты. Дополнительные уровни, а в особенности испытания заставили так попотеть, что никакие Dark Souls рядом не стояли. Рекомендую всем! Пойду, теперь, съем тортик!

Short? Yes.
Masterful like you wouldn't believe? Absolutely.
With some truly deceptive puzzles, perfect writing and one of the most memorable antagonists I have ever known, Portal 2 makes for an essential reading (playing?) in gamer syllabuses.
A bit late to the party, but this game is a blast. Can't wait to play some co-op in Portal 2 with a friend after this.

Portal does not outstay it's welcome. It is a short, sweet puzzle game which everyone should play through atleast once. It was ahead of its time when it was first released, and even for 2021, it fits in perfectly. Unique in its concepts, almost perfect in its execution, it is hard to find games like this.

Интересная, но короткая

I love The Portal! About 43 minutes and 12 seconds into the game is the best part! I'm sure most players will agree that’s it’s a very thrilling and arousing moment, it's just so.....visceral. However, like others have experienced, I got motion sickness too. I get vertigo from games like this, which in turn upsets my stomach, when in turn gives me horrible gas. And when there have been a lot of vegetables in my lunch and dinner on an evening when I am playing The Portal, the fumes are overwhelmingly pungent, painfully putrid, pervasively pestilent, and even poisonous smelling. My mother was sickened at the stench when she entered the basement when I was playing. Now, she won’t stop bringing it up. One Sunday after Church, about a week into playing The Portal, she told father Goldstein about it, and they lectured me on the problems associated with video games. This went on for a really long time, and it was making me angry because she mentioned the smell from the gas, and they both chuckled. How dare they!? They don’t know me! Now it’s become a fun inside joke for them, but at my expense. I’LL SHOW THEM! Someday, when they are sleeping, I will show them!!!!!!! So for these reasons, I cannot in good conscience give this game, The Portal, a positive review.
